text:
@realDonaldTrump @PressSec excuse me while I VOMIT! 

Careful, you may get bone spurs in your arm - patting yourself so much on the back

#COVID19 #COVIDー19

Getting great reviews, finally, for how well we are handling the pandemic, https://t.co/TR4QopNc3T
